### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. @quick007 Can applying the following rules help to resolve your issue?

```adblock
youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com,youtube.com#@%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'ytInitialPlayerResponse.adPlacements', 'undefined')

youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com,youtube.com#@%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'playerResponse.adPlacements', 'undefined')
```

Also not reproduced it on my end. Try to check the site without third-party filters, except ublock ones. As I recall, it's recommended to enable them.
Unfortunately, uBO does not support such rules and you see the cookie window.
However, AdGuard products do that, so you won't see the cookies.

comment.body:
Hi, reproducible 100% if I have DuckDuckGo set as default search engine and search from the omnibox/addressbar. Now I have AdGuard disabled on DuckDuckGo and no issue since. Safari 17.      <~>Am 09.10.2023 um 13:02 schrieb Alex ***@***.***>:﻿
@thommesborg When it happens - when you search from the site or from the address bar?
Checked 10 requests from address bar and 10 on the site in the same tab - not reproduced.

—Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or unsubscribe.You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.***>
Correct.

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end. Is `advanced protection` enabled?
First, disable `Ad block pro`. Then try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

Также рекомендуется установить AdGuard Extra.

---

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
